text: Muhammad Rifad Marasabessy (born 7 July 1999) is an Indonesian professional footballer who plays as a right back for Liga 1 club TIRA-Persikabo. ==Career== ===Madura United=== In January 2017, Rifad signed a two-year contract with Madura United to commence ahead of the 2017 Liga 1. He made his debut in the Liga 1 on April 16, 2017 against Bali United. ===Tira Persikabo=== In February 2019, Rifad joined TIRA-Persikabo Bogor. ==International career== On 31 May 2017, Rifad made his debut against Brazil U-20 in the 2017 Toulon Tournament in France. And Rifad is one of the players that strengthen Indonesia U-19 in 2018 AFC U-19 Championship. == Honours == === International === Indonesia U-19 * AFF U-19 Youth Championship Third place: 2017, 2018 ==References== ==External links== * Rifad Marasabessy at Goal.com * Rifad Marasabessy at Soccerway Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Indonesian footballers Category:Indonesia youth international footballers Category:Madura United F.C. players Category:Liga 1 (Indonesia) players Category:People from Tulehu Category:Sportspeople from Maluku (province) Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Association football wingers
title: Rifad Marasabessy
